Name: FTBOceanBlock
Overview: [b]FTB OceanBlock[/b][br]Time to dive in![br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

@attributes.Name: Installed Location
@attributes.Description: Path to store the installed server files.

@attributes.Name: EULA
@attributes.Description: Do you agree to the Mojang EULA available at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula? Server will not start without accepting. Set to 'true' to accept.

@attributes.Name: OPS
@attributes.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability

@attributes.Name: Port
@attributes.Description: Port for the server. Ignored if using a dedicated IP for the container.

@attributes.Name: LEVEL
@attributes.Description: Name of the world directory.  It is usually world.
